parameters.name: Collection
parameters.label: Source Collection
parameters.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| distinct SourceCollectionName 
| extend Collection = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection", SourceCollectionName)
| project Collection

content.json: __Azure Purview__ Azure Purview is a unified data governance service that helps you manage and govern your on-prem, multicloud, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data. It creates a holistic, up-to-date map of your data landscape with automated data discovery, sensitive data classification, and end-to-end data lineage that empowers you to find valuable and trustworthy data. Learn More

content.query:
let NumberofSourcesByRegion = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| distinct SourcePath, SourceRegion
| summarize AssetCount = count() by SourceRegion;

NumberofSourcesByRegion
content.title: Number of Sources by Region

content.query:
let allAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource}", ","))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath, SourceType
| summarize AssetCount = count() by SourceType;

let classifiedAssets =  PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource}", ","))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand Classification
| where Classification != ""
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath, SourceType
| summarize AssetClassifiedCount = count() by SourceType;

let ClassifiedAssetsByResourceType = allAssets
| join kind= leftouter classifiedAssets on SourceType
| extend ClassifiedPercentage = strcat(round((100.0 * AssetClassifiedCount / AssetCount),2), "%")
| extend AssetCount = strcat(AssetCount, " assets found in total")
| project SourceType, AssetCount, AssetClassifiedCount, ClassifiedPercentage;

ClassifiedAssetsByResourceType
content.title: Number of Classified Assets Found Based on Resource Type

content.json: To use the Asset Drilldown view, select the row of the data source in the Sources table below to get a list of all assets scanned by Purview in that data source. Within the Assets Drilldown, click on the Asset Path hyperlink to view the Details pane. To view the data source within the Azure portal, click on the data source hyperlink in the Assets Drilldown table.

content.query:
let allAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource}", ","))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath
| summarize AssetCount = count() by DataSource = SourcePath;

let classifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource}", ","))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand Classification
| where Classification != ""
| distinct AssetPath, SourcePath, SourceType
| summarize AssetClassifiedCount = count()  by DataSource = SourcePath;

let AssetsDrilldown = allAssets
| join kind= leftouter classifiedAssets on DataSource
| extend ClassifiedPercentage = round((100.0 * AssetClassifiedCount / AssetCount),1)
| project DataSource, AssetCount, AssetClassifiedCount, ClassifiedPercentage;

AssetsDrilldown
content.title: Sources

content.query:
let ClassificationCountAdded = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| mv-expand ClassificationDetails
| summarize ClassificationCount= sum(toint(ClassificationDetails["UniqueCount"])) by AssetPath;

let classifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource}", ","))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| where "{UserSelectedDataSource:value}" == "All" or (split("{UserSelectedDataSource:value}", ", ")) contains SourcePath;

let classifiedAssetsWithCounts = classifiedAssets 
| join ClassificationCountAdded on AssetPath
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationTrigger, ClassificationDetails, SourceScanId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationTrigger, ClassificationDetails, SourceScanId;

let labeledAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource}", ","))
| mv-expand SensitivityLabel to typeof(string)
| where SensitivityLabel != int(null)
//| extend SensitivityLabel = iif(isempty(SensitivityLabel), "No Label", SensitivityLabel)
| mv-expand SensitivityLabelDetails
| summarize arg_max(SensitivityLabel, SourceType, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabelDetails) by AssetPath
| project AssetPath, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabelDetails;

let table = classifiedAssetsWithCounts
| join kind= leftouter labeledAssets on AssetPath
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationDetails, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId
| sort by ClassificationCount;

table
content.title: Assets Drilldown

content.json: __Classifications__ Classifications within Azure Purview display which sensitive information resides within your organization. A list of supported classifications can be found at Sensitive Information Type Entity Definitions.

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| where Classification != ""
| summarize ClassifiedAssetCount = count() by DateClassified = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), SourceType
content.title: Classification Events

content.query:
let ClassificationCountAdded = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| mvexpand ClassificationDetails
| summarize ClassificationCount= sum(toint(ClassificationDetails["UniqueCount"])) by AssetPath;
let TopClassifiedAssets = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "));

TopClassifiedAssets | join ClassificationCountAdded on AssetPath 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, ClassificationCount, AssetName, AssetType, AssetPath, FileExtension, FileSize, SourceType, SourcePath) by AssetPath 
| project AssetPath, SourcePath, ClassificationCount
| top 4 by ClassificationCount;
content.title: Top Assets with Classifications

content.json: To use the Classifications Drilldown view, select a Classification in the Classifications table below to get a list all assets scanned by Purview with that classification. Within the Asset Level Drilldown, click on the Asset Path hyperlink to view the Details pane. To view the data source within the Azure portal, click on the data source hyperlink in the Asset Level Drilldown table.

content.query:
let Classifications = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification"
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Classification, FileSize, AssetType) by AssetPath 
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| summarize FileSize = round(sum(FileSize)/1000000,2), AssetCount = count() by Classification
| project Classification, AssetCount, FileSize;

Classifications
content.title: Classifications

content.query:
let ClassificationCountColumn = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| mv-expand ClassificationDetails
| summarize ClassificationCount = sum(toint(ClassificationDetails["UniqueCount"])) by AssetPath;
let ClassificationsDrilldown = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Classification" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| extend classifications = split(Classification, ',')
| mv-expand classifications
| extend Classification = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(classifications))
| where Classification != ""
| where "{UserSelectedClassification:label}" == "All" or (split("{UserSelectedClassification:label}", ", ")) contains Classification;

ClassificationsDrilldown | join ClassificationCountColumn on AssetPath
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationDetails, SourceScanId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, ClassificationTrigger, Classification, ClassificationCount, ClassificationDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId;

ClassificationsDrilldown
content.title: Classifications Drilldown- Asset Level

content.json: __Sensitivity Labels__ Sensitivity Labels let you classify your organization's data in order to highlight which resources contain sensitive information. Labels can be set up through Security and Compliance Center and applied in Azure Purview. Learn More

content.query:
PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| where SensitivityLabel != ""
| summarize LabeledAssetCount = count() by DateClassified = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), SourceType
content.title: Sensitivity Labeling Events

content.query:
let LabelPercentage = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling"
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand SensitivityLabel
| summarize arg_max(AssetName, tostring(SensitivityLabel), SourceType) by AssetPath 
| summarize LabelCount = count() by SensitivityLabel, SourceType;

LabelPercentage;
content.title: Percentage of Labels Applied

content.json: To use the Sensitivity Labels Drilldown view, select a Sensitivity Label in the table below to get a list all assets scanned by Purview with that label. Within the Asset Level Drilldown, click on the Asset Path hyperlink to view the Details pane.

content.query:
let SensitivityLabels = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand SensitivityLabel
| extend newSensitivityLabel = tostring(SensitivityLabel) //iff(SensitivityLabel== "", "No Label", SensitivityLabel)
| summarize arg_max(newSensitivityLabel, SourceType, FileSize) by AssetPath 
| summarize FileSize = round(sum(FileSize)/1000000,2), AssetCount = count() by newSensitivityLabel
| sort by AssetCount;

SensitivityLabels
content.title: Sensitivity Labels

content.query:
let labelDrilldown = PurviewDataSensitivityLogs
| where ActivityType == "Labeling" 
| where "{PurviewAccount:label}" == "All" or PurviewAccountName in~ (split("{PurviewAccount:label}", ", "))
| where "{DataSource:label}" == "All" or SourceType in~ (split("{DataSource:label}", ", "))
| extend CollectionName = iff(SourceCollectionName == "","No Collection",SourceCollectionName)
| where "{Collection:label}" == "All" or CollectionName in~ (split("{Collection:label}", ", "))
| mv-expand SensitivityLabel to typeof(string)
| mv-expand SensitivityLabelDetails to typeof(string)
| where "{UserSelectedLabel:label}" == "All" or "{UserSelectedLabel:label}" == SensitivityLabel
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceScanId) by AssetPath 
| project TimeGenerated, PurviewTenantId, PurviewAccountName, PurviewRegion, AssetName, AssetPath, AssetType, AssetCreationTime, AssetModifiedTime, AssetLastScanTime, FileExtension, FileSize, ActivityType, SensitivityLabelTrigger, SensitivityLabel, SensitivityLabelDetails, SourceName, SourceType, SourcePath, SourceSubscriptionId, SourceRegion, SourceCollectionName, SourceScanId;

labelDrilldown
content.title: Sensitivity Labels Drilldown- Asset Level
